trans-unit.source: Represents the data passed around with the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 代表以剪貼簿傳遞的資料。

trans-unit.source: The ClipboardData contains three types of data: - The data itself, accessed through the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ClipboardData.Data%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ClipboardData 包含三種類型的資料:-資料本身，透過存取<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ClipboardData.Data%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ClipboardData.Data%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The metadata, accessed through the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ClipboardData.Metadata%2A> property.
- The version information, accessed through the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ClipboardData.Version%2A> property.
Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ClipboardData"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the data passed around on the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定以剪貼簿傳遞的資料。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> of type <xref:System.Object> that contains the data passed around on the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>型別的<xref:System.Object>，其中包含以剪貼簿傳遞的資料。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the metadata passed around on the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定以剪貼簿傳遞的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> of type <xref:System.Object> that contains the metadata passed around on the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>型別的<xref:System.Object>，其中包含以剪貼簿傳遞的中繼資料。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version information passed around on the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定以剪貼簿傳遞的版本資訊。

trans-unit.source: The version information passed around on the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 剪貼簿傳遞的版本資訊。
